name: Dig It
description:
Collect all jewels in the levels and evade the evil ghosts. Let the bags drop to find treasures and valueable upgrade items. Explore the underground levels to complete them in time. Use special items to kill or catch the ghosts to get additional scores.

Inspired by one of the most famous games of the last decades, you can now become the greatest Digger of all times also on Android (Mobile, Tablet and TV) . Dig it brings you a greatly polished and vastly extended version of a classic game with awesome new features and gameplay.
